DrawToolScreen.description:
TOOL [Client] Called after the default tool screen has been drawn.

[number] width
  The width of the tool's screen in pixels.

[number] height
  The height of the tool's screen in pixels.

LeftClick.description:
TOOL [Shared] 

[table] tr
  A trace from users eyes to wherever he aims at. See TraceResult structure
